text: satyaniṣēdhikaḷ paṟayunnu: "ñaṅṅaḷ ī khur'ānileārikkaluṁ viśvasikkilla. atinu mumpuḷḷa vēdaṅṅaḷiluṁ viśvasikkilla." ī atikramikaḷe avaruṭe nāthanṟe aṭuttu nirttunnat nī kaṇṭirunneṅkil! annēramavar parasparaṁ kuṟṟārēāpaṇaṁ naṭattikkeāṇṭirikkuṁ. ihalēākatt mardicceātukkappeṭṭirunnavar ahanta naṭiccirunnavarēāṭu paṟayuṁ: "niṅṅaḷillāyirunneṅkil ñaṅṅaḷ viśvāsikaḷāyirunnēne
